trans-unit.source: Provides core services of the Microsoft Annotations Framework to manage and display user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona servicios básicos de Microsoft Annotations Framework para administrar y mostrar anotaciones de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear e iniciar un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> que se utiliza con un control de vista de documentos especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> can be used with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> puede utilizarse con el siguiente documento controles de vista:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclases derivadas

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The document reading control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: Control de lectura de documento asociado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para su uso con un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: Control de vista de documentos asociado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para su uso con un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: Control de vista de documentos asociado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> que se utiliza con un control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived controls:
trans-unit.target: Este constructor puede utilizarse con <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> controles derivados:

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to clear highlight annotations from the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa el comando para borrar anotaciones resaltadas de la selección actual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo asignar comandos enrutados a elementos de menú en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a highlight annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa el comando para crear una anotación resaltada en la selección actual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo asignar comandos enrutados a elementos de menú en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create an ink-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa el comando para crear una anotación de nota de lápiz en la selección actual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo enrutados comandos se asignan a elementos de menú en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a text-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa el comando para crear una anotación de nota de texto en la selección actual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo enrutados comandos se asignan a elementos de menú en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note, text-note, and highlight annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa el comando para eliminar todas las anotaciones resaltadas, de nota de lápiz y de nota de texto en la selección actual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo asignar comandos enrutados a elementos de menú en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note and text-note annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa el comando para eliminar todas las anotaciones de nota de lápiz y de nota de texto en la selección actual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo enrutados comandos se asignan a elementos de menú en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Disables annotations processing and hides all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Deshabilita el procesamiento de anotaciones y oculta todas las anotaciones visibles.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> is called all annotations become hidden.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> se llama a todas las anotaciones se ocultan.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> method when you stop the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> método cuando se detiene el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: The annotation store to use for reading, writing, and displaying annotations.
trans-unit.target: Almacén de anotaciones que se utiliza para leer, escribir y mostrar anotaciones.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> for use with a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> and displays all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Habilita un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> que se utiliza con un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> determinado y muestra todas las anotaciones visibles.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> is called all annotations in the viewer control window are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> se llama a todas las anotaciones en la ventana de control de Visor se muestran.

trans-unit.source: (The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)
trans-unit.target: (El control de visor asociado con el servicio de anotación se especifica en el parámetro para el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method when you start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> método cuando se inicia un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="annotationStore" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="annotationStore" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociado a un control de vista de documentos especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método se puede utilizar para devolver el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> asociado con el siguiente documento controles de vista:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclases derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El control de visor asociado con el servicio de anotación se especifica en el parámetro para el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The document reader control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
trans-unit.target: Control de lector de documentos para el que se devuelve la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociado a un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document reader control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified document reader has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociado al control de lector de documentos determinado; o <see langword="null" /> si el lector de documentos especificado no tiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método se puede utilizar para devolver el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> asociado con el siguiente documento controles de vista:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclases derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El control de visor asociado con el servicio de anotación se especifica en el parámetro para el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The document viewer control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
trans-unit.target: Control de visor de documentos para el que se devuelve la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociado a un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document viewer control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified viewer control has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociado al control de visor de documentos determinado; o <see langword="null" /> si el control de visor especificado no tiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método se puede utilizar para devolver el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> asociado con el siguiente documento controles de vista:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclases derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El control de visor asociado con el servicio de anotación se especifica en el parámetro para el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
trans-unit.target: Control de vista de documentos para el que se devuelve la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance associated with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociada a un control de vista de documentos especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document viewing control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified document viewing control has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> asociado al control de vista de documentos determinado; o <see langword="null" /> si el control de vista de documentos especificado no tiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método se puede utilizar para devolver el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> asociado con el siguiente documento controles de vista:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclases derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El control de visor asociado con el servicio de anotación se especifica en el parámetro para el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> está habilitado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.IsEnabled%2A> property when you create and start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.IsEnabled%2A> propiedad al crear e iniciar un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: Also if the user chooses to open a new document in the viewer control, the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> must be disabled for the old document and then enabled for the new document.
trans-unit.target: También si el usuario elige abrir un nuevo documento en el control de visor, la <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> debe estar deshabilitada para el documento anterior y, a continuación, habilitado para el nuevo documento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> empleado por este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> usado por este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> is specified as a parameter in the service's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> utilizado por el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> se especifica como un parámetro en el servicio <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Store%2A> property when you start and stop an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Store%2A> propiedad al iniciar y detener un <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
